channel.title: Nallely MIDI
channel.description: Nallely is an experimental organic system for advanced MIDI patching, live coding, generative music, and multimodal art, built for hacker/musicians, developed in Python, inspired by Smalltalk

item.title: A website for Nallely
item.dc:creator: Dr. Schlange
item.description: Nallely and Trevor gets their own website

item.title: How to make Nallely understand new MIDI devices
item.dc:creator: Dr. Schlange
item.description: How to add a new MIDI device in Nallely

item.title: Let's build a VCA with Nallely
item.dc:creator: Dr. Schlange
item.description: How to build a Voltage Control Amplifier with Nallely from scratch

item.title: Presenting Nallely
item.dc:creator: Dr. Schlange
item.description: Nallely is an organic living system for MIDI

item.title: Let's remember the good old patchs
item.dc:creator: Dr. Schlange
item.description: Patch management, memory management, versioning and opportunities
